Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller

Class SpaceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller.SpaceInfo
  • public final class SpaceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The SpaceInfo class maintains the information about the current state of the actor space.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static SpaceInfo INFO
      The SpaceInfo instance.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Reference getBroadcast​(Reference r)
      Gets the local broadcast reference of the actor space giving the reference of an its actor.

      Gets the local broadcast references of the connected actor spaces.
      Reference getBroker()
      Gets the reference of the service provider of the actor space acting as communication broker.

      Gets the actor space configuration.

        Returns:
        the instance.

      • getProviders

        public java.util.Set<Reference> getProviders()
        Gets the references of the service providers of the connected actor spaces.
        Returns:
        the references. The references are contained in an immutable set.

      • getProvider

        public Reference getProvider​(Reference r)
        Gets the reference of the service provider of the actor space giving the reference of an its actor.
        Parameters:
        r - the actor reference.
        Returns:
        the service provider reference. Note that the return value is null if such an actor is no more connected with the current actor space.

      • getExecutors

        public java.util.Set<Reference> getExecutors()
        Gets the references of the actor executors of the connected actor spaces.
        Returns:
        the references.

      • getExecutor

        public Reference getExecutor​(Reference r)
        Gets the reference of the actor executor of the actor space giving the reference of an its actor.
        Parameters:
        r - the actor reference.
        Returns:
        the actor executor reference. Note that the return value is null if such an actor is no more connected with the current actor space.

      • getBroadcasts

        public java.util.Set<Reference> getBroadcasts()
        Gets the local broadcast references of the connected actor spaces.
        Returns:
        the references. The references are contained in an immutable set.

      • getBroadcast

        public Reference getBroadcast​(Reference r)
        Gets the local broadcast reference of the actor space giving the reference of an its actor.
        Parameters:
        r - the actor reference.
        Returns:
        the local broadcast reference. Note that the return value is null if such an actor is no more connected with the current actor space.

      • getBroker

        public Reference getBroker()
        Gets the reference of the service provider of the actor space acting as communication broker.
        Returns:
        the reference. Note that it returns the local service provider when the actor space is not connected with other actor spaces.

      • getPopulation

        public int getPopulation()
        Gets the number of actors running in the actor space.
        Returns:
        the number of actors.

      • getServices

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getServices()
        Gets the class qualified names of the services provided by the actor space.
        Returns:
        the class qualified names. The class qualified names are contained in an immutable set.
